name: Mawari
description:
Created for the Black and White Jam #8

DISCLAIMER: It is almost impossible to beat in its current state, but with the right strategy it can be done. I didn't quite finish but I hope you enjoy it in some way!

It is my first game jam, and my first publicly released game. Please try it out and give me your feedback! I plan to wrap it up after the jam.

Controls:

  • Left Click: Action
  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Move

Objective:

  • Defend your base at the top and destroy the enemy bases to the left, right, and bottom. Gather resources to place defenses, and avoid the water unless there is a raft!
